Key Match Events: The Brewers scored one of their runs on a double steal in the third.
Matt Chapman mishandled a throw as William Contreras broke for home and scored on the play.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Bob Melvin expressed frustration with the string of short outings from his starting staff.
Third baseman Matt Chapman insisted that the team remains confident that a run for playoff spot remains in the cards.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers' Aaron Civale pitched seven scoreless innings while allowing only two hits.
Others: The loss dropped the Giants to seven games behind the Braves for the final NL Wild Card spot, pending Atlanta's game Thursday night.
